website_summaries.verdict: Those who need to keep their medications at a specific temperature can now remove the guesswork, save money, and keep their health intact.
pros: Connects easily with most smartphones, enabling user to track meds such as insulin in cooler bags, providing an alert if temperature goes above acceptable levels
A built-in database brings up most common meds so they don't have to be entered manually
cons: Be careful opening the battery compartment, which only needs a quarter turn, or grooves may strip and damage the cover

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: To use this product you need to be within bluetooth range of the device. If you travel and keep it close then this product is for you but if you want to keep tabs on a fridge with medical items inside you will only get a reading if the phone is close. If they had a server that connected to the phone so you could view the temperature remotely then this product would absolutely be worth it but in its current state its a sophisticated paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Useful for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is a generally ok product which gives you the temperature for your insulins and lets you put in which insulin you're using and which mode (using or unopened). My main problem with this product is that it doesn't automatically sync with the phone app and even when you have the app pulled up it still doesn't sync and takes 3-4 mins to do so with no manual option of doing so. It's really annoying because it takes so long to sync and there's no way to do it yourself. Other than that great customer service that reached out to me personally after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless temperature sensor I have found
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MedAngel One to monitor the temperature in my refrigerator. Using it I found out that the temperature in my refrigerator varied greatly depending on the location inside. Now I know with confidence that my Enbrel medication is safe and at the right temperature. No more guessing if my meds are OK. Customer Support is also great. This is a must for those that have temperature sensitive meds.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Ensure Correct Temp of Medication
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat has helped me greatly when traveling abroad, and monitoring the temperature of my medicine that requires to stay below 8 C. It alarms me anytime my medication reaches above and below its safe temperatures and has even helped me notice that my fridge has been warmer than it should have been. Although you may have to be within a close proximity of the sensor since it runs on Bluetooth, it is truly a great stress relief to own such a product when carrying expensive medicine outside of a fridge. Shipping was quick and was easy to set up on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in order to make sure my son's insulin was being stored at the safe recommend temperature. We have to carry his emergency glucagon on us and insulin in case we need it. We live in Texas so it's always hot. We carry his glucagon and insulin in a frio bag. I love that I can drop the MedAngel One in the frio bag with insulin and be able to check to make sure the frio is keeping my son's insulin at the safe temperature. This device has given me a great peace of mind in regards to my son's insulin. It allows me to constantly check on the insulin and the temperature it's being stored at.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Takes the worries out of traveling with my insulin.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these to track temperature on my insulin: one in the fridge, one in my carry case and one in a small chiller I use during hot weather. Works great, helped me get the temperature setting and location in my fridge optimized, and it's essential when travelling - for example had a situation where the car with my luggage was getting hot even in moderate weather. Gave me enough warning to turn on the AC and save a vial. One of the three units failed after a few months. The company replaced it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well - wish it went WiFi instead of BlueTooth
customer_reviews.text: BT only is quite limiting - only one device gets status and alerts. Not good when used in a medical scenario, as there are no backups or alternate solutions to make up for the multitude of BT weaknesses, like receiving range. I use my "guest wifi" network as my home services network, and this should be part of that service, hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to setup!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. It’s reassuring to know my fridge is at the correct temp, but I bought this mainly for taking on vacation so that I know my insulin won’t be getting too warm... that’ll be next month!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Schmutz

customer_reviews.title: Does not sync with app - customer support doesn't help
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry with insulin that needs to be temperature controlled. After initial setup, the sensor does not reliably sync with the app, making it useless. I have reset it, added it multiple times, restarted my phone, uninstalled the app, and always have the same issues. It makes it useless. I've tried to contact customer support, but never received a response. This is marketed as a product to help people, but it just ends up taking your money in exchange for a useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wormer

customer_reviews.title: MedAngel ONE keeps track of insulin temperature and is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: MedAngel ONE was simple to start. The temperature data is reassuring, confirming storage in the refrigerator is in recommended range. I am considering getting one to travel with, to assure insulin remains in recommended range. Being able to attribute names to the individual units will make it easy to monitor stored and carried insulin. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: EBI

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: product doesn't work more than half the time. Bluetooth signal cuts in and out even thou the device and my phone haven't moved. Submitted request for tech help 6-7 times and no response. Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: Jumpin' Jimmy the Guitar Gooroo

customer_reviews.title: Great job tracking insulin temperature
customer_reviews.text: Gives us peace of mind that the fridge is providing the required temperature range for our son's insulin.
customer_reviews.author: AggieEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Horrible customer service. My sons sensor stopped connecting to his phone on 8/6 since then it won’t sync no matter how many times I delete the app restart the phone turn blue tooth on and off. I even bought a new battery trying to fix it myself. Sadly I’m out 50 plus the cost of a new battery because I’m 4 days past the 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like MedAngel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have 3 that monitor the insulin I carry, the basal insulin at room temperature, and the insulin in my refrigerator. Living in Texas makes the one I carry with my bolus insulin so valuable. One meal on a hot patio can ruin a vial of insulin! My MedAngel keeps me alerted!
customer_reviews.author: Col.  C. S. Johnson III

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Sub great execution.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth barely ever connects. No function button to do a manual connect. Customer service is non existent. Great concept for refrigerator monitoring for those with meds like insulin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone who travels with medication that needs cooling. Simple to use and the info and warnings it provides are incredibly valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Wetherbee

customer_reviews.title: Dead unit and poor docs
customer_reviews.text: Unit didn't function. The supplied setup doc is a bit confusing as it implies the battery door screws open. It should only be slightly screwed then pried open. The support website listed on the included setup document didn't exist (404 error).
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with current versions of Android
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with current versions of Android. Product Support is unresponsive for over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Craig LaForest

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and extremely helpful. My daughter is using it for her daughter and really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whether the temperature is too hot or too cold.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because I was able to monitor insulin temperature while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jean J.

customer_reviews.title: A much needed item for anyone who uses insulin.
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about MedAngel. I wish I had know about this device years ago. It would have made golf tournaments, power outages, traveling with insulin easier. My son now uses in his dorm refrigerator to make sure nothing happens to his insulin.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product. Super easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product. Super easy to use and set up, and very responsive customer care team. Definitely will be repurchasing when the batteries expire.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The battery compartment was jammed upon arrival. After struggling to open it, I installed the battery correctly but couldn’t get it to connect to the app. Useless. I contacted the co through their website and never heard from them. It’s a good paperweight. Terrible customer service, product doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: C Bird

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT! One of those products you don't know you need till it becomes available. Getting ready to order another one for my son who is off at college. Set it up and then noticed my son's insulin for his type 1 diabetes could be in a better place in the fridge. The little alerts are great. Love that this product will help with traveling with insulin. Something so small could make a big difference. With the cost of insulin, it super important to treat it like liquid gold and preserve it to ensure efficacy of the product. Insulin is a life saving drug and spoiled insulin could be deadly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Imber

customer_reviews.title: The best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best money investment I have ever made! The peace of mind know my daughter insulin is safe with the temperature! Haven’t have any problems with it. Easy to set up and use the app.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Truly an insulin Angel
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It keeps my insulin temp and I can see it on my phone app! Peace of mind in Texas heat.
customer_reviews.author: freckles28

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing sends alerts at the most random times, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my insulin safe and sound and helped me adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeping my insulin safe and sound and helped me adjust my refrigerator to the prior temp for storage. Plan to order another one for my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jorychi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - No more worries!
customer_reviews.text: This awesome - I love it! Works perfectly and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gadget. I use it to check whether the refrigerator where I store my insulin, at home, work, or during travel, is maintaining the medicine at the correct temperature. It's important to keep medication like insulin at the correct temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: This is good but the battery was missing from mine
customer_reviews.text: this functions as expected. True I am not a fan of the App since it really does not follow insulin pumps but besides that mine did not have a battery too. This did provide info though that my pump was getting hot in my jeans pocket when I am in the direct Sun at least here in TX. Overall though it does provide a useful sensor for sure
customer_reviews.author: Chris S. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful
customer_reviews.text: Super little gadget! The app is clear and easy to use. I like it because I did not know what is the storage range for my vial of NovoLog and how different it is from Lantus. Use it in the fridge and with my frio bag at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Results
customer_reviews.text: I've had the MedAngel ONE for a couple of months and it doesn't work for me. I keep insulin in a refrigerator in our detached garage. It's unable to read the temperature from within the refrigerator so I actually have to take it out of the refrigerator to get a reading. Not what I had hoped for. I've reported the problem several times to MedAngel and they've responded a couple of times with "give us 2 more weeks for a software fix" but have failed to fix the issue or follow up with me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased to announce that the device and app work as ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased Med Angel with the intention of using it for air travel on longer flights across the Atlantic. I am pleased to announce that the device and app work as advertised. The timeline feature is very useful; I can go back and make sure that my medication was never in any danger at any point.
customer_reviews.author: Eiji Hisaoka

product_meta.title: MedAngel One - Smart Thermometer for Insulin and Medications
product_meta.description: MedAngel ONE is a smart temperature sensor for medication. Protect your meds from getting too hot or cold with the world’s first bluetooth thermometer designed for medication. Keep a sensor in your cool box, travel bag or fridge and stop worrying about whether your medicines are losing effectiveness. Temperatures are tracked constantly and alerts are sent to your smartphone if they’re at risk of freezing or heating up. The companion app supports more than 300 medications and is available for free on the App Store for iPhone and iPad, and Google Play for Android smartphones and tablets.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY. Bluetooth Temperature Sensor for Medication App compatible with iPhone/iPad and Android. See exactly what happened overe the last 30 days in timeline view
WATERPROOF DESIGN. Up to 20 meters safe to use in coolers, Frio coolbags and cooling wallets
MADE FOR YOUR MEDICATION. Simply select yours from the list of US and EU approved medications: insulins, biologics, MS-medications, hormones, epoetins, pen injectors and many more
SMART ALERTS. Every time the temperature approaches or exceeds the safe levels, you get intuitive alerts and notifications
LONG LIFETIME. MedAngel ONE sensor is powered by a standard coin cell battery which lasts for 8 to 9 months, simply replace it yourself and make the sensor last for years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars81 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
